thread.title: Senator Graham Tweets He Is ‘Mucho Sad’ Over Prospect Of Trump’s Mexican Tariff
thread.title_full: Senator Graham Tweets He Is ‘Mucho Sad’ Over Prospect Of Trump’s Mexican Tariff

author: Jack Davis
title: Senator Graham Tweets He Is ‘Mucho Sad’ Over Prospect Of Trump’s Mexican Tariff
text:
Poll Suggests Mass. Voters Want ‘Someone Else’ Over Warren 
Later, Spicer said it was only one idea being considered and that its economic impact would have to be examined. 
White House Chief of Staff Reince Priebus echoed Spicer, telling NBC News the 20 percent tax is among a “buffet of options.” 
The tariff was discussed on a day when Mexican President Enrique Peña Nieto and Trump each acted to cancel a meeting between the two leaders. Trump has said Mexico must pay for the wall he wants to build between the two nations. Nieto has said Mexico will not do so. 
Although the 20 percent tax is not yet a final proposal, at least one Mexican official is braced for problems ahead. 
“There is an atmosphere of crisis in the United States and it is going to last a long time,” former Foreign Minister Jorge Castaneda said. “We are going to have to get used to living like this.” What do you think? Scroll down to comment below. Advertisement Popular Right Now
